value.title: Using Precedence to force Power BI Aggregations
value.excerpt: Are your Power BI Aggregations not matching? Setting Precedence can control which Power BI aggregation will be preferred. A little hint to help it on its way! value.title: What Does Power BI Cost? (Including Power BI Report Server)

He will break down the Power BI cost and covers licenses, Power BI Premium and including Power BI Report Server and more! value.title: What is a Power BI tenant? (Office 365 / Azure Active Directory)
